alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Taney, south central Christian, Stone and southeastern Barry Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1115 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Purdy to 6 miles southeast of Cassville to near Beaver. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Branson, Table Rock Lake, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Lake Taneycomo, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Kimberling City, Shell Knob, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Galena, Mccord Bend, Golden, Table Rock, Emerald Beach and Eagle Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southwestern Missouri.
